titles.title: Marijuana in Federally Assisted Housing Parity Act of 2024
Marijuana in Federally Assisted Housing Parity Act of 2024
A bill to provide that an individual who uses marijuana in compliance with State law may not be denied occupancy of federally assisted housing, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
